author: Special Correspondent
text:
The Election Department has sent a advisory list to the banks:

Furnish the name, key persons and other details of the outsourced agencies/companies carrying bank cash for loading in the ATMs.

Banks should strictly instruct the outsourced agencies not to carry any third party’s cash.

Issue letters indicating the amount carried in the vans.

Any amount which is in excess will be seized and action will be initiated against the agency.

Personnel of the outsourced agencies should have to compulsorily carry their identity cards and necessary authorisation papers from the bank concerned.

Co-operation with

flying squads

The personnel of the outsourced agencies should cooperate with flying squad/ static surveillance teams and facilitate inspection and volunteer all the available information.
title: Election Department’s advisory to banks
